newsitem.title: GERMANY: Buba allots 69.0 bln marks in tender at 3.30 pct.
newsitem.headline: Buba allots 69.0 bln marks in tender at 3.30 pct.

text.p: The Bundesbank said it allocated 69.0 billion marks of 14-day securities repurchase funds at this week's tender at a fixed interest rate of 3.30 percent.
A repo pact for 69.9 billion marks also set at a fixed 3.30 percent expires today, Wednesday, so a net 900 million marks is draining from the market.

The Bundesbank said banks bid for 86.3 billion marks of the repurchase funds this week. It accepted 80.0 percent of the bids made. The repo rate has been steady at 3.30 percent since February. --Frankfurt Newsroom +49 69 756525
